thread.title: Bobbi Gianguzzi Benzing
thread.title_full: SecureDataRecovery.ca reviewed by Bobbi Gianguzzi Benzing

author: Bobbi Gianguzzi Benzing
title: Bobbi Gianguzzi Benzing
text: Purchased an WD External Hard Drive from Costco, to store over 20 years worth of photos and videos of my family as well as some business files.... Some of those were backed up on a cloud base, but the last 2 years have been crazy and therefore I didn't get around to the backups While on vacation my hard drive failed....After watching hours of YouTube videos and purchasing items to help restore the drive, I was unsuccessful. Although SDR is expensive, it is just like having a surgery with intricate work being done on my device, I figured it was worth the investment... Thank God I did, as I forgot some of the other items that were on that device. Chris was amazing and knowledgeable They were able to restore 98% of my device in just a few days, and were so professional to work with Hopefully I never need their services again, but I would suggest them 100% Bobbi B
